title: Cause for Alarm! (restored, with intro and outro) (1951, film noir, imdb score: 6.4)

sources.title: Cause For Alarm 1951 Restored Movie 720p Hd 202510
sources.description: Cause for Alarm! is a 1951 melodrama suspense film directed by Tay Garnett , written by Mel Dinelli and Tom Lewis, based on a story by Larry Marcus. Ellen ( Loretta Young ) narrates the tale of "the most terrifying day of my life", how she was taking care of her bedridden husband George Z. Jones ( Barry Sullivan ) when he suddenly dropped dead. The film is in the public domain.
